attributes.action:
had more than 3 cbt,s
Upgrade restrictions on engine size to 400cc
attributes.additional_details:
Things to think about 
A 50cc motorcycle cbt should be cancelled 125cc for the beginners 
And people with road experience up to a 400c
attributes.background:
Not every biker wants a large engine cc motorcycle 
The full motorcycle licence allows 600cc and above 
What about all of the smaller cc motorcycles
That are mad 
400cc for bikers that don't won't a full motorcycle licence...

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you want to see changes to what type of motorbikes people can drive after passing the CBT a certain number of times, but we're not sure if you just want people who have passed CBT three times to drive motorcycles up to 400cc, or other changes as well.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
